1. Introduction

Welcome to Nomi ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a safe, inclusive dating experience for people with disabilities. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

2. Information We Collect

When you use Nomi, we may collect:

  • Account Information: Name, email address, profile photo, and date of birth from your Facebook account when you sign up.
  • Profile Information: Disability tags, interests, bio, photos, and preferences you provide.
  • Usage Data: How you interact with the app, including swipes, matches, and messages.
  • Device Information: Device type, operating system, and browser type.

3. How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

  • Create and manage your Nomi account
  • Show you potential matches based on your preferences
  • Enable messaging between matched users
  • Improve our services and user experience
  • Ensure safety and prevent abuse

4. Information Sharing

We do not sell your personal information. We may share information:

  • With other users as part of the matching experience (profile info)
  • With service providers who help us operate the app
  • When required by law or to protect safety

5. Data Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access your personal data
  • Correct inaccurate data
  • Delete your account and data
  • Export your data

7. Data Retention

We retain your data while your account is active. You can delete your account at any time, and we will remove your data within 30 days.

8. Children's Privacy

Nomi is not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

10. Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Email: privacy@nomi.app
